sentences.en: Corn is treated when the stalk starts to elongate.
sentences.cn: 在玉米秆开始拔节时，给玉米打药。

sentences.en: Elongate olivine crystals were aligned to produce a flow texture as this liquid phase crystallized.
sentences.cn: 在液相结晶时,长形橄榄石晶体的成行排列产生了流状构造.

sentences.en: Elongate the backbone, extend arms and slowly lift the shoulders.
sentences.cn: 拉长脊骨, 伸展手臂,慢慢抬高肩膀.

sentences.en: Her legs were elongated by the very high heels which she wore.
sentences.cn: 她穿的高跟鞋非常高，使她的腿显得长了。

sentences.en: IBA treatment can promote the root elongate growth and the root lignification of M. hupehensis Rehd.
sentences.cn: 吲哚丁酸能够促进湖北海棠根系导管的分化,使根系的木质化程度增加.

sentences.en: In grasses the leaves elongate in the dark and break through the surrounding coleoptiles.
sentences.cn: 在草本植物中,叶子在黑暗中伸长,穿破包围它们的胚芽鞘而生长.

sentences.en: In the leaves elongate the dark and break through the surrounding coleoptiles.
sentences.cn: 叶子在黑暗中伸长,穿破包围它们的胚芽鞘而生长.

sentences.en: Indicates a weld in a flanged corner groove. Lines will elongate when height is increased.
sentences.cn: 指示在法兰转角沟中焊接. 线可随着深度的增加而拉长.

sentences.en: Indicates a weld in a flanged edge groove. Lines will elongate when height is increased.
sentences.cn: 指示在折缘沟中焊接. 线可随着深度的增加而拉长.

sentences.en: Indicates a weld in a flared - bevel groove . Stems will elongate when height is increased.
sentences.cn: 指示在喇叭形坡口焊接. 杆可随着高度的增加而拉长.

sentences.en: Microtubules most likely elongate the invadopodium by delivering materials as enzymes the tip.
sentences.cn: 微管很可能通过运送酶等物质而使树突状伪足继续伸长.

sentences.en: RTV, flexible, elongate and excellent oil resistance, blue.
sentences.cn: 柔性好, 高延伸率,耐润滑油性能好, 蓝色.

sentences.en: Stem erect or floating, elongate, 5 - angled, nodes often with adventitious roots.
sentences.cn: 茎直立或漂浮, 拉长, 5具角, 节通常具不定根的.

sentences.en: The beetle is, in fact, less elongate.
sentences.cn: 这种甲虫实际上不太长.

sentences.en: These elongate sand bodies are attached to a bulge of the mainland.
sentences.cn: 这些长条形砂体连接于主陆的突出部位.

sentences.en: These sandstone bodies form elongate lenses.
sentences.cn: 这些砂岩体形成伸长的透镜体.

words.tran_cn: 伸长；伸长率；延伸率；延长
延长（elongate的过去分词）；把…拉长

trans.tran_en: to become longer, or make something longer than normal
